item.title: 随着经济放缓，一些中国年轻人放弃了企业工作，转而追求“自我时间”
item.description: Faced with diminishing job prospects as the economy slows, Chu Yi is choosing to "lie flat", a Chinese term used to describe people who work just enough to afford to spend their time on what they enjoy.翻译:面对经济放缓带来的就业前景黯淡，褚毅选择“平躺”，这是一个中文术语，用来形容那些工作只够花时间做自己喜欢的事情的人。
item.author: Nicoco Chan

item.title: 部分大众汽车因中国零件在美国港口延误
item.description: Volkswagen said on Wednesday it expected to resolve by the end of March delays in the delivery of thousands of vehicles held up at U.S. ports due to a customs problem.翻译:大众汽车周三表示，预计将在 3 月底之前解决因海关问题而滞留在美国港口的数千辆汽车的交付延误问题。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：德国对华投资创历史新高
item.description: German direct investment in China rose by 4.3% to a record high of 11.9 billion euros ($12.7 billion) last year and also increased as a share of the country's overall investment abroad, official Bundesbank data analysed by the IW institute showed.翻译:IW研究所分析的德国央行官方数据显示，去年德国对华直接投资增长4.3%，达到创纪录的119亿欧元（127亿美元），占德国对外投资总额的比重也有所增加。
item.author: Sarah Marsh

item.title: 中国、美国主导的全球补充枯竭石油库存有望提振需求
item.description: A push to replenish depleted oil stocks notably in China, the United States and Europe could buoy demand and prices in coming months, analysts and traders said, as tensions in the Middle East threaten key shipping lanes.翻译:分析师和交易商表示，随着中东紧张局势威胁到主要航道，推动补充耗尽的石油库存（尤其是在中国、美国和欧洲）可能会在未来几个月提振需求和价格。
item.author: Natalie Grover, Noah Browning, Ahmad Ghaddar

item.title: 台湾报告中国在附近进行另一次“战备巡逻”
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said it detected 14 Chinese air force planes operating around Taiwan and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships on Wednesday.翻译:台湾国防部表示，周三发现有 14 架中国空军飞机在台湾周围活动，并与中国军舰进行“联合战备巡逻”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国太平洋盟友所罗门群岛预计将于四月举行选举
item.description: The Solomon Islands is expected to next week call a national election for April, with China security ties emerging as a key issue as political parties launch campaigns in the Pacific Islands nation.翻译:所罗门群岛预计将于下周举行四月份全国大选，随着各政党在这个太平洋岛国发起竞选活动，与中国的安全关系将成为一个关键问题。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 电梯制造商迅达预计 2024 年和中期利润率将实现稳健增长
item.description: By Ozan Ergenay and Louis van Boxel-Woolf翻译:作者：Ozan Ergenay 和 Louis van Boxel-Woolf
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 日经新闻称，中国比亚迪计划在墨西哥新建电动汽车工厂
item.description: China's BYD Co Ltd will set up a new electric vehicle (EV) factory in Mexico, Nikkei reported on Wednesday, citing the company's Mexico head, as the EV maker aims to establish an export hub to the United States.翻译:《日经新闻》周三援引该公司墨西哥负责人的话说，中国比亚迪有限公司将在墨西哥建立一家新的电动汽车（EV）工厂，该电动汽车制造商的目标是建立一个对美国的出口中心。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：印度IT部担心在智能手机出口竞赛中输给中国和越南
item.description: India risks losing out to China and Vietnam as it seeks to become a major smartphone export hub and must "act fast" to lure global companies with lower tariffs, the deputy IT minister said in government documents seen by Reuters.翻译:印度信息技术部副部长​​在路透社看到的政府文件中表示，印度在寻求成为主要智能手机出口中心时面临着输给中国和越南的风险，必须“迅速采取行动”以较低关税吸引全球企业。
item.author: Aditya Kalra, Munsif Vengattil

item.title: 澳大利亚贸易部长要求中国解除壁垒，质疑王判刑
item.description: Australia's trade minister said on Tuesday he would meet his Chinese counterpart at a World Trade Organization conference in Abu Dhabi this month and push for the removal of restrictions on imported Australian wine, lobsters and meat.翻译:澳大利亚贸易部长周二表示，他将于本月在阿布扎比举行的世界贸易组织会议上与中国贸易部长会面，并推动取消对澳大利亚葡萄酒、龙虾和肉类的进口限制。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 印度在MSCI关键指数中缩小与中国的差距，权重再创新高
item.description: India has narrowed the gap with China in MSCI's Global Standard index, which tracks emerging market stocks for investors, after the latest revision.翻译:在最新修订后，印度在摩根士丹利资本国际全球标准指数（该指数为投资者追踪新兴市场股票）中缩小了与中国的差距。
item.author: Bharath Rajeswaran

item.title: 美国通胀数据公布后，股市下跌，美元和收益率上涨
item.description: Global stock market indexes dropped, the 10-year U.S. Treasury yield hit a 2-1/2-month high and the dollar touched a three-month peak against the yen on Tuesday after data showed U.S. inflation slowed less than expected in January.翻译:数据显示1月份美国通胀放缓幅度低于预期，全球股市指数下跌，10年期美国国债收益率触及2-1/2个月高点，美元兑日元触及三个月高点。
item.author: Caroline Valetkevitch

item.title: 通胀数据公布后美元升至三个月高点并突破150日元
item.description: The dollar rose to three-month peaks on Tuesday, after data showed U.S. inflation rose more than expected in January, reinforcing expectations that the Federal Reserve will hold interest rates steady in March.翻译:数据显示美国1月份通胀升幅超出预期，强化了美联储将在3月份维持利率稳定的预期，周二美元升至三个月高点。
item.author: Gertrude Chavez-Dreyfuss

item.title: 早盘买盘：日元兑美元接近 150 十字路口
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 沃伦·巴菲特 Squishmallows 的制造商 Build-A-Bear 在法庭上对峙
item.description: Warren Buffett is taking on Build-A-Bear.翻译:沃伦·巴菲特正在挑战“Build-A-Bear”。
item.author: Jonathan Stempel

item.title: 美国议员呼吁对中国药明康德生物技术公司实施制裁
item.description: The U.S. should review Chinese biotech firm WuXi AppTec and its affiliate WuXi Biologics for sanctions, a bipartisan group of lawmakers told top Biden administration officials on Monday.翻译:两党议员周一告诉拜登政府高级官员，美国应审查中国生物技术公司药明康德及其附属公司药明生物的制裁。
item.author: Michael Martina

item.title: 民主党参议员对拜登竞选加入 TikTok 的决定表示担忧
item.description: The chair of the Senate Intelligence Committee said on Monday he is concerned about the decision by the campaign of President Joe Biden to join short-video app TikTok, while the White House said nothing has changed about government national security concerns.翻译:参议院情报委员会主席周一表示，他对乔·拜登总统竞选团队加入短视频应用 TikTok 的决定感到担忧，而白宫表示，政府对国家安全的担忧没有任何改变。
item.author: David Shepardson, Trevor Hunnicutt

item.title: 比特币两年多来首次触及 5 万美元水平
item.description: Bitcoin hit the $50,000 level for the first time in more than two years as the world's largest cryptocurrency was buoyed by expectations of interest rate cuts later this year and last month's regulatory nod for U.S. exchange-traded funds designed to track its price.翻译:比特币两年多来首次触及 50,000 美元的水平，全球最大的加密货币受到今年晚些时候降息的预期以及上个月美国监管机构批准旨在跟踪其价格的交易所交易基金的提振。
item.author: Hannah Lang, Elizabeth Howcroft

item.title: 早盘竞价：5,000 个乐观的理由
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Amanda Cooper.翻译:阿曼达·库珀 (Amanda Cooper) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：小米称印度对中国企业的审查令供应商感到不安
item.description: China's Xiaomi has told the Indian government that its heavy scrutiny of Chinese companies has made smartphone component suppliers wary about setting up operations in India, according to a letter and a source with direct knowledge of the matter.翻译:据一封信函和一位直接了解情况的消息人士称，中国小米已向印度政府表示，其对中国公司的严格审查使得智能手机零部件供应商对在印度设立业务持谨慎态度。
item.author: Aditya Kalra, Munsif Vengattil
